title: Brazil's ex-president loses bid to avoid jail
text:
Brazil's ex-president loses bid to avoid jail 3:25am EDT - 01:11 
Brazil's Supreme Court early on Thursday rejected former president Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva's plea to avoid prison while he appeals a corruption conviction.   
Brazil's Supreme Court early on Thursday rejected former president Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva's plea to avoid prison while he appeals a corruption conviction.  //www.reuters.com/video/2018/04/05/brazils-ex-president-loses-bid-to-avoid?videoId=415014481&videoChannel=13421
